title: SpellCheckComponent not working properly
description: Spell Check component is returning wrong results. If I have 2 products Seeds6 and Seeds5. Searching for Seeds6 will automatically return Seeds5 and not Seeds6 which was the actual string searched for

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
Please raise issues like this on the Solr User's list until we're reasonably sure that this is an actual code problem and not a usage problem.

Closing until we make that determination.
